browse-receipt-for-adjustment.sqlwhere: ReceiptHeader.receiptNumber is not null and ReceiptHeader.receiptNumber <> 'null' and ReceiptHeader.receiptStatus = '4010' and (ReceiptHeader.receiptType = 'O' or ReceiptHeader.receiptType = 'P') and (ReceiptHeader.owner = :as_userid or ReceiptHeader.forwardTo = :as_userid) and ReceiptHeader.refNumber in (SELECT distinct PoHeader.poNumber FROM PoHeader as PoHeader, PoLine as PoLine WHERE PoHeader.icPoHeader = PoLine.icPoHeader and PoLine.status >= '3030' and PoLine.status <= '4010' and PoLine.status <> '3045' and (PoLine.receiptRequired = 'E' or PoLine.receiptRequired = 'R') )
browse-receipt-for-adjustment.title: Receipts Available for Adjustments
